sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"结果"之意。
means: consequence ： 多指随某一事件引起的，必然或自然的不良结果，不强调直接的因果关系，而侧重事件发展的逻辑关系。
result ： 普通用词，含义广泛，侧重因某种原因所产生的最终结果，而不是眼前的结果。
effect ： 指因某种原因直接产生的结果，着重持续稳定与其影响。
outcome ： 普通用词，多指事物经过一系列发展变化所导致的最终结局，而不是某种原因的直接结果。常可与result通用。

sentence.Network_en: Where he is from is of no consequence to me.
sentence.Network_cn: 他来自何方对我来说并不重要。

sentence.Network_en: Wastage was no doubt a necessary consequence of war.
sentence.Network_cn: 巨大的损耗无疑是战争的必然结果。

sentence.Network_en: As an overseer, he suddenly found himself a person of consequence.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为工头，他突然觉得自己是个重要人物。

jx.jx_en_mean: accept responsibility for the negative results or effects of one's choice or action

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin consequentia, from consequent- 'following closely', from the verb consequi

entry.def: The consequences of something are the results or effects of it.

example.ex: Her lawyer said she understood the consequences of her actions and was prepared to go to jail...
example.tran: 她的律师说她明白自己行为的后果，已有了入狱的心理准备。

example.ex: An economic crisis may have tremendous consequences for our global security.
example.tran: 一场经济危机可能严重影响到全球安定。

entry.def: If one thing happens and then another thing happens in consequence or as a consequence, the second thing happens as a result of the first.

example.ex: His death was totally unexpected and, in consequence, no plans had been made for his replacement...
example.tran: 他的死完全出乎意料，所以，根本没有安排替补人选。

example.ex: Maternity services were to be reduced in consequence of falling birth rates.
example.tran: 由于出生率下降，产科服务会随之削减。

entry.def: Something or someone of consequence is important or valuable. If something or someone is of no consequence, or of little consequence, they are not important or valuable.

example.ex: As an overseer, he suddenly found himself a person of consequence...
example.tran: 作为工头，他突然觉得自己是个重要人物。

example.ex: Where he is from is of no consequence to me.
example.tran: 他来自何方对我来说并不重要。

entry.def: If you tell someone that they must take the consequences or face the consequences, you warn them that something unpleasant will happen to them if they do not stop behaving in a particular way.

example.ex: These pilots must now face the consequences of their actions and be brought to trial...
example.tran: 这些飞行员现在必须为自己的行为承担后果，接受审判。

example.ex: If climate changes continue, we will suffer the consequences.
example.tran: 如果气候变化继续下去，我们将自食其果。

means.word_mean: 1. a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon;

sentences.sentence: "the magnetic effect was greater when the rod was lengthwise"
"his decision had depressing consequences for business"
"he acted very wise after the event"

means.word_mean: 2. the outcome of an event especially as relative to an individual;

sentences.sentence: "decisions of great consequence are made by the president himself"
"virtue is of more moment that security"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fortunately, your opinion is of no consequence whatsoever.

auth_sentence.res_content: The obvious consequence is that prices are going up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The obvious consequence is that prices are going up.

auth_sentence.content: Maybe there's hope for consequence-free cheese after all.
auth_sentence.res_content: Maybe there's hope for consequence-free cheese after all.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Maybe there's hope for consequence-free cheese after all.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ob加强+sequ跟随,追+ious……的→拼命跟随别人
sequ跟随,追+acious多……的→跟随太多的→盲从的
sequence[[n.先后,次序;连续,数列]]拿省鷄dj.接续而来的
sequent=sequence[n.先后,次序;连续,数列]+ial……的→adj.连续的,一连串的
sub在后面+sequ跟随,追+ent表形容词→随在后面的
con全部+sequence连续→全部连续不断的跟随而来→结果,后果;重要性
second=sequ跟随,追→次等的→第二→秒[分为小时第一等级,秒为二]
sequ跟随,追+ence表名词→跟随→连续
sub在后面+sequ跟随,追+ence表名词→随在后面
second=sequ跟随,追→次等的→第二→秒[分为小时第一等级,秒为二]

Sentence.sentence: Partly as a consequence of this limited time, over half of all American homes now have microwave ovens
Eventually, the cheater gets caught, and the later he/she gets caught, the worse the consequences
The consequences of getting caught are serious and may include a "O" on a test or assignment, an "F" in the class, suspension (暂令停学) or dismissal from school and a ruined reputation.
What is said to be the consequence of a shrinking population?
To date, the US has seemed unable to see the consequences of spending so much more than is taken in.
The third rule is to be ready to cite options and consequences.

sentences.en: Nobody can tell what the consequences may be.
sentences.cn: 没有人能说出可能的后果。

sentences.en: This matter is of great consequence to all of us.
sentences.cn: 对于我们来说这件事非常重要。

jushi.english: This matter is of great consequence to all of us.
jushi.chinese: 对于我们来说这件事非常重要。

jushi.english: Nobody can tell what the consequences may be.
jushi.chinese: 没有人能说出可能的后果。
